text:
Héctor Cavallero (October 2, 1939 – October 2, 2020) was an Argentine Socialist politician. He was born in Las Parejas, Santa Fe. He was Mayor of Rosario, Santa Fe from 1989 to 1995. Cavallero was a member of the Chamber of Deputies between 1999 to 2003.
Cavallero died on his 81st birthday on October 2, 2020 at a hospital from pneumonia-related problems in Rosario.
